name: Magneto Ball
overview: An action game created by OneButtonSmashers and released for Christmas 2019. You are a small magnetic ball, speeding across a magnetic surface the only world you know. Sadly your world is crumbling and the Magnetic bricks that make up the surface beneath you are dropping into the void. As long as a reasonable part of your ball is still touching a brick, the Magnetic field stops you from falling into that limitless void. How many
